markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Channel Protection Amulet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3062)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 286 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 56 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This nugget of polished tektite is trapped in a cage of braided wire and hangs from a silken cord. When wearing this amulet, you gain resistance 5 against damage from [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) spells if you're living, or against [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spells if you're undead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Channel Protection Amulet
